code: import React from'react';import SpeechRecognition,{useSpeechRecognition}from'react-speech-recognition';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var App=function App(){var _useSpeechRecognition=useSpeechRecognition(),transcript=_useSpeechRecognition.transcript,listening=_useSpeechRecognition.listening,interimTranscript=_useSpeechRecognition.interimTranscript,resetTranscript=_useSpeechRecognition.resetTranscript,browserSupportsSpeechRecognition=_useSpeechRecognition.browserSupportsSpeechRecognition;var startListening=function startListening(){SpeechRecognition.startListening({continuous:true,language:'es-AR'});};var count=0;var palabras=transcript.split(" ");var indicePalabra=palabras.indexOf("boludo");var palabra=palabras[indicePalabra];for(var i=0;i<palabras.length;i++){if(palabras[i]==="boludo"||palabras[i]==="boludos"){count++;}}if(!browserSupportsSpeechRecognition){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"Browser doesn't support speech recognition."});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Microphone: ",listening?'on':'off']}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:startListening,children:"Start"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:SpeechRecognition.stopListening,children:"Stop"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:resetTranscript,children:"Reset"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:transcript}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:interimTranscript}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Contador de boludos: ",count]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:palabra})]});};export default App;
